title: Educational Infographic Design: Color Utilization and Memory Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design principles and data visualization comprehension
context.additional_context: Specialized Course for Science Education Material Design Targeting Intermediate Learners in Professional Fields (Medical/Legal/Technical)

learning_goals: Learners can explain infographic design principles reflecting visual hierarchy aligned with educational objectives
Learners can create infographics that effectively convey information by applying color theory (RGB/CMYK)
Learners can evaluate the impact of design elements (colors/layouts) on information retention using A/B testing techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
